00001 /*
00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              PANNER (1 INPUT / 2 OUTPUTS)
00004  *******************************************************
00005  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00006  *              copyright © 2003 by Timothy A. Place
00007  *
00008  */
00009 
00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_PAN_H
00012 #define TT_PAN_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 #include "tt_audio_signal.h"
00017 
00018 
00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 class tt_pan:public tt_audio_base{
00026 
00027         private:
00028                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00029                 typedef void (tt_pan::*FuncPtr)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00030                 FuncPtr dsp_executor;
00031                 
00032                 // Attribute Values
00033                 tt_attribute_value              position;
00034                 tt_attribute_value              shape;
00035                 tt_attribute_value              mode;
00036                         
00037                 
00038         public:
00039                 enum selectors{                                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00040                         k_shape,
00041                         k_mode,
00042                         k_position,
00043                         k_shape_equalpower,
00044                         k_shape_linear,
00045                         k_mode_lookup,
00046                         k_mode_calculate
00047                 };
00048                 
00049                 
00050                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00051                 tt_pan(void)                                                                            // Constructor          
00052                 {
00053                         set_attr(k_position, 0.5);
00054                         set_attr(k_shape, k_shape_equalpower);
00055                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_lookup);
00056                 }
00057 
00058                 ~tt_pan(void)                                                                           // Destructor
00059                 {
00060                         ;
00061                 }
00062 
00063 
00064                 // ATTRIBUTES
00065                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00066                 {
00067                         switch (sel){
00068                                 case k_position:
00069                                         position = clip(val, (float)0.0, (float)1.0);
00070                                         break;
00071                                 case k_shape:
00072                                         shape = val;
00073                                         break;
00074                                 case k_mode:
00075                                         mode = val;
00076                                         break;
00077                         }
00078                         // set the function pointer for the correct dsp loop to run
00079                         if(shape == k_shape_linear)
00080                                 dsp_executor = &tt_pan::dsp_vector_calc_linear;
00081                         else if(mode == k_mode_calculate)
00082                                 dsp_executor = &tt_pan::dsp_vector_calc_equalpower_calc;
00083                         else if(mode == k_mode_lookup)
00084                                 dsp_executor = &tt_pan::dsp_vector_calc_equalpower_lookup;
00085                 }
00086 
00087                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00088                 {
00089                         switch (sel){
00090                                 case k_position:
00091                                         return position;
00092                                 case k_shape:
00093                                         return shape;
00094                                 case k_mode:
00095                                         return mode;
00096                                 default:
00097                                         return 0.0;
00098                         }
00099                 }
00100                 
00101                 /*****************************************************
00102                  * DSP LOOPS
00103                  *****************************************************/
00104                 
00105                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00106                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00107                 {
00108                         (*this.*dsp_executor)(in, out1, out2);          // Run the function pointed to by our function pointer
00109                 }
00110         
00111         private:
00112                 // DSP LOOP: LINEAR SHAPE
00113                 void dsp_vector_calc_linear(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00114                 {
00115                         tt_sample_value temp;
00116                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00117                         
00118                         while(temp_vs--){
00119                                 temp = *(in->vector++);
00120                                 *(out1->vector++) = temp * (1.0 - position);
00121                                 *(out2->vector++) = temp * position;
00122                         }
00123                         in->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00124                 }
00125 
00126                 // DSP LOOP: EQUAL POWER LOOKUP MODE
00127                 void dsp_vector_calc_equalpower_lookup(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00128                 {
00129                         tt_sample_value temp;
00130                         short                   index;
00131                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00132 
00133                         while(temp_vs--){
00134                                 temp = *(in->vector++);
00135                                 index = (int)(position * 511.0);
00136                                 *(out1->vector++) = temp * lookup_equalpower[index];
00137                                 *(out2->vector++) = temp * lookup_equalpower[511 - index];
00138                         }
00139                         in->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00140                 }
00141 
00142                 // DSP LOOP: EQUAL POWER CALCULATED
00143                 void dsp_vector_calc_equalpower_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00144                 {
00145                         tt_sample_value         temp;
00146                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00147                         
00148                         while(temp_vs--){
00149                                 temp = *(in->vector++);
00150                                 *(out1->vector++) = temp * (sin((1.0 - position) * 1.5707963));
00151                                 *(out2->vector++) = temp * (sin(position * 1.5707963));
00152                         }
00153                         in->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00154                 }
00155 
00156 };
00157 
00158 #endif // TT_PAN_H
